string.text: In many emergency situations require masks because they allow you to clean your air. Does this function filter. As over time it can not efficiently clear the air, it needs to be replaced. Devices help in emergency situations. One filter lasts about 5 minutes.
a filter for the gas mask
This source is used to operate the servo. Is a battery with a high energy level. Completely discharging the batteries need to be replaced.
Small batteries type "AAA" or in use three. Necessary for the operation of electronic devices in the Area. Also they can be used to charge a depleted PDA.
a gas Mask EO-20 PBF (with filter)
